cards.description: [ACTIVATED] If your opponent activated a Spell last turn: Apply that Spell's activated effect.
[ACTIVATED] Equip 1 Equipment from your opponent's Grave to an opponent's Champion then you can Shuffle 1 Equipment from the Field into the Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 'Useless Potion' then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Equip 1 'Extra Padding' from your Deck to your Champion then Heal 10 damage from that Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Look at the top 5 cards of your Deck and place them back in any order then Draw a card.
[ACTIVATED] Return all Equipment from the Field to the Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle this card and 1 card from each Grave into the Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to each Champion for each of their Equipment Slots
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 Earth Equipment equipped to your Champion then you can Equip 'Popping Spores' from Grave to that Champion
[ACTIVATED] Send the top two cards of your opponent's Deck to the Grave.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion then Equip this card to a Fire Slot as a Fire Equipment.
[ACTIVATED] Shuffle any number of cards from your Hand into your Deck then Draw the same number of cards.
[ACTIVATED] Draw 3 cards then Discard 1 card for each Champion you control.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 card then Revive 1 defeated Champion with 10 health.
[ACTIVATED] Select 2 Champions: any damage dealt to one is instead dealt to the other until the end of your next turn.
[ACTIVATED] Draw cards equal to the number of 'Meditation' in your Grave +1.
[ACTIVATED] Deal damage to a Champion equal to 20 X the number of 'Fireball Barrage' in your Grave.
[ACTIVATED] Draw cards equal to the number of Spells in your Grave then Discard the same number of cards.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 Equipment you control then Deal 30 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 'Sacred Spring' you control then Deal 40 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] If your opponent activated an equipment effect last turn: Equip this card to an Earth Slot as an Earth Equipment and while this card is on the field that Equipment cannot be activated.
